Tag_Youmay.description: the memory of Kassandra | the [[Agis of the North | mercenary]]

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Agis of the North|Agis believed himself undefeatable, and that belief took him far in his line of mercenary work. Kassandra, however, had a thing or two to say about that.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'

General_Description: '''Agis of the North''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: At the request of the old [[Ide|lady]], Kassandra sought out the [[mercenary]] known as [[Agis of the North]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated Agis of the North.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''
